actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the full deduction allowable with respect to income attributable to domestic production activities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the phasing in of the tax deduction for income attributable to domestic production activities and permit the full 9% deduction amount for taxable years beginning after 2008. Repeals the limitation on such tax deduction for oil-related production activities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the full deduction allowable with respect to income attributable to domestic production activities, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the full deduction allowable with respect to income attributable to domestic production activities, and for other purposes.
